message: Saturday Feb 26th from 8:00 pm to 12:00 am

Grand Slam (Burnsville)
12425 River Ridge Boulevard Burnsville, MN 55337-4871

The cost is $10 for unlimited games of Laser tag (as well as unlimited mini golf, bumper carts and there are also arcade games)! Grand Slam has a huge space with two levels jam packed with foggy, lazer-y awesome-ness!
Super excited! Love me some laser tag :D
I can't remember if I ever broke 10k points there. Whatever it was, it was pretty damn epic.
lololol you'll break 10k if you pick up gun #XX. It is extremely OP. Unlimited lives and ammo :)
Hopefully I'll be able to make it to this.
It will be really fun! You should consider it :)
sounds fun but where is it? is it within biking distance or can I hitch a ride?
